ActivateEmailContact.name: ActivateEmailContact
ActivateEmailContact.description: Grants permission to activate the email contact associated with the given ARN if the provided code is valid

CreateEmailContact.name: CreateEmailContact
CreateEmailContact.description: Grants permission to create an email contact

DeleteEmailContact.name: DeleteEmailContact
DeleteEmailContact.description: Grants permission to delete an email contact associated with the given ARN

GetEmailContact.name: GetEmailContact
GetEmailContact.description: Grants permission to get an email contact associated with the given ARN

ListEmailContacts.name: ListEmailContacts
ListEmailContacts.description: Grants permission to list email contacts

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get tags for a resource

SendActivationCode.name: SendActivationCode
SendActivationCode.description: Grants permission to send an activation link to the email associated with the given ARN

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource
